alert.note: Alert for Northern Outer Banks (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 3:02PM EST until February 18 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Up to 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the Croatan, and Roanoke Sounds, Kitty Hawk Bay, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Up to 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in a low threat of property damage. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Oregon Inlet NC MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.4 ft, Moderate 3.9 ft, Major 4.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/10 PM 1.7 1.1 1.2 2-3 None 18/09 AM 3.3 2.7 2.8 2-3 Minor 18/09 PM 1.0 0.4 0.5 2 None 19/10 AM 0.7 0.1 0.2 1 None 19/09 PM 0.8 0.2 0.3 1-2 None 20/10 AM 0.7 0.1 0.2 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
